worksheets.title: Worksheet 1: The Python Calculator
worksheets.description: Learn to use Python for basic arithmetic with the print() function.

worksheets.title: Worksheet 2: Storing Your Numbers
worksheets.description: Learn to use variables to store and manipulate data in Python.

worksheets.title: Worksheet 3: Making Things Repeat
worksheets.description: Learn to use loops to repeat actions in Python.

worksheets.title: Worksheet 4: Making Decisions
worksheets.description: Learn to use if, elif, and else statements to create programs that can make choices and respond to different conditions.

worksheets.title: Worksheet 5: Working with Text
worksheets.description: Learn to use strings to work with text and create more expressive programs.
